name: Gettin' Comfy
description:
Getting Comfy is a game made for Global Game Jam 2019 about trying to find the comfiest spot in your bed.

Controls/Objective:

Use mouse to drag your hand/feet to the matching spot on the bed without running out of energy! Make sure to watch out for the random things placed around your bed.

Credits:
Emily Rizzo
Chase Wade
Bradley Singletary
Roswell "Ell" Asonibe
Zachary Bracken


We did use free art assets since we had no artist :)
